overview:
Validas automated the wireless bill auditing process, making it easy to understand, analyze, and optimize wireless bills. It provides consulting and analysis to large enterprises and government agencies using a combination of industry experts and its SaaS technology.

The company also provides services for consumers and small businesses in a self-service, online mode through FixMyCellBill.com. Validas core technology is also available on a licensed basis.

Validas has the ability to scan pdf wireless bills to analyze them for errors and find mismatches between customers’ actual usage and subscribed voice, data, and messaging plans. It automates plan comparison and “right sizing” and is proven to reduce wireless expenses by anywhere from 15 to 40 percent without sacrificing service levels.

Validas is also a source for wireless market data based on actual customer usage. This data can be used for identifying usage trends, creating pricing benchmarks, and defining mobile user segments for mobile marketing.
